使迷惑；使混乱不清；使困窘（confuse的ing形式）
可能被混淆的；可能被弄糊涂的
混乱地；受困惑地；慌乱地

bilingual.target: 单词的真正含义是：困惑的。
“我们就要出发了？”我非常困惑的说。

bilingual.source: What is the most confused issue on budgeting?
bilingual.target: 最感困惑的 预算问题是什么?。

bilingual.source: Stephanie: I’d say be prepared to be confused.
bilingual.target: 斯特凡妮:要我说，做好困惑的准备。

bilingual.source: A related idea is that a confused facial expression alerts others to help the confused person.
bilingual.target: 一个有关的观点是困惑的面部表现会提醒其他人，要帮助那些处于困惑中的人。

bilingual.source: And my students kind of looked at each other, all confused.
bilingual.target: 学生们面面相觑，很困惑的样子。

bilingual.source: They are just young players who're get confused. I feel sorry for them.
bilingual.target: 她们只是感到困惑的年轻选手而已。我为她们感到遗憾。

bilingual.source: Many people are confused about what to do in the face of a mental health emergency.
bilingual.target: 许多人感到困惑的是在面临心理健康的突发事件时应做什么来防止。

bilingual.source: I'm inclined to think that that way of thinking about the question is really confused.
bilingual.target: 我倾向于认为,这种思考问题的方法是很让人困惑的。

bilingual.source: It's actually amusing to note the confused expression of the waiter or waitress as you confirm.
bilingual.target: 行侍应确认“是的，请给我一张一人餐桌”时留意他或她脸上浮现的困惑的神色，其实是挺有趣的。

list.abstract: confused（英 [kənˈfjuːzd]，美 [kənˈfjuːzd]），英语单词，作形容词为不能清晰思考的；昏乱的；糊涂的。作动词为困惑。例句有At best, kids might be confused（顶多，孩子们可能会感到困惑。） confused的近义词有troubled、chaotic、puzzled，反义词有clearheaded。

yingyinNormal.en: Joy. Don't touch it! I'm so confused!
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，不要碰。我很疑惑啊!!!

yingyinNormal.en: Marriage? Yes! I'm sorry. I'm confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 婚姻？是的！不好意思我有点头晕。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm confused, because there's not a list?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我糊涂了，完全没有清单？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: You voted for me. Are you confused? Are you afraid?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是你们投票给我的。困惑吗？害怕吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Did my husband ask you to do this? No. Then I'm confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我丈夫叫你这么做的吗？不是。那我就想不通了。

yingyinNormal.en: What have you done to me? I'm broken. I'm pretty. I'm confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们对我做了什么？我被毁了，我变美了，我很困惑。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure by now, you must all be very confused, angry, frightened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你现在一定感到迷茫，愤怒和恐惧。

yingyinNormal.en: We can put you back. Oh, I'm not going back! I'm not that confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以把你变回去。我才不要变回去，我还没那么困惑。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, maybe he was getting confused him with his childhood therapist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许他把他跟他小时候的心理医生搞混了。

yingyinNormal.en: Here is Mummy Pig. How are you getting on, Grandpa Pig? I'm confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪妈妈过来了。照顾孩子还顺利吗？我很困惑啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, most days the place is packed with confused, angry baseball fans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，很多时候那地方都挤满了混淆又生气的棒球迷。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Listen, I heard about the engagement. Surprised? And confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿。嘿，我听说订婚的事了。惊讶吧？而且很困惑。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm confused. You're always saying that you want to spend more time with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不懂了。是你总说希望有更多时间和我相处。

yingyinNormal.en: I know it's a strange concept. But I don't like when categories get confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道这是个奇怪的概念，但我不喜欢概念混淆。

yingyinNormal.en: He looked at me confused, And then so I was looking at him confused. And then he was like, "oh, I'm sorry. Are you a trainer?" And I was just kind of just like standing there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个保安就困惑地看着我，于是我也困惑地看着他，然后他说“哦，抱歉，你是队上的训练师吗？” 我站在那不知道说什么好。

yingyinNormal.en: Not to be confused with the French Fry Goodness Inventory. That's pure Cooper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要和炸薯条好坏问卷搞混了，那个是我库珀的大作。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm still confused. Leonard, I don't see how I could have made it any simpler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是不懂。莱纳德，我已经说得够明白的了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm still confused. How well do you know my husband? How well? Mm, not very. Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是不明白，你跟我丈夫有多熟？多熟？不太熟，怎么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Six of one, right? What? Why are, why are we stopping? I'm very confused, Phillip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎样都是一样，对吧？什么？我们为什么在这里停我不明白，菲利普。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm not confused at all. You're like a sexy toddler. I don't know how to process that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一点都没搞错，你简直像个性感的婴儿。我不知道该怎么接话了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The man might have been <highlight>confused</highlight> by the fact that Rome is written "Roma" in Italian and "Rom" in German.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位男士可能被意大利语中的“罗马”和德语中的“罗马”搞得很困惑。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>confused</highlight> creature and camera­-holding humans stared at each other through a fence for several minutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 困惑的生物和拿着相机的人类隔着栅栏盯着对方看了几分钟。

examination_example.sentence: When students feel isolated or <highlight>confused</highlight> and reach out with questions that go unanswered, their motivation to continue begins to fade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当学生感到孤立或困惑，并且提出的问题未得到回答时，他们继续学习的动力开始减弱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: unable to think clearly or to understand what is happening or what sb is saying

examination_example.sentence: Although still <highlight>confused</highlight>, the students started writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管还很困惑，学生们还是开始写了。

examination_example.sentence: But the students were <highlight>confused</highlight> (迷惑的) because there was nothing but just a black dot (点) in the center of the paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但学生们感到困惑，因为纸的中心除了一个黑点什么都没有。

examination_example.sentence: Even many native English speakers are often <highlight>confused</highlight> by the meanings of these terms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 甚至许多以英语为母语的人也经常被这些术语的含义所迷惑。
